title: Daytona Beach News-Journal: Local News, Politics & Sports in Daytona Beach, FL
text:
Who is Lenny Fries, pizza shop owner charged with drug trafficking?

A defense attorney for Lenny's Pizza owner, Leonard Fries Jr., said Fries sold pizzas and any claims that he was a drug dealer are incorrect.
